content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Greetings, thank you for considering my property. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 800 euros per month, but I am willing to negotiate. Can you provide an initial offer?
name: Max Müller

content: Certainly, based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates, I am willing to offer a starting price of 900 euros per month. However, I am open to considering a lower price if you can provide a valid reason for your budget constraints.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student, so I don't have a lot of income. I would like to see if we can come to an agreement on a lower price.

Could you possibly lower the price to 800 euros per month?

And is there a possibility to pay in advance to lower the monthly rent?

Thank you for your consideration.

I agree to the price of 800 euros per month. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Thank you again.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your understanding. While I am unable to lower the price to 800 euros per month, I am willing to consider a lower price if you can provide a valid reason for your budget constraints. Additionally, paying in advance is not possible in this case as the rental agreement is based on a monthly payment. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and wish you the best of luck with your studies.
name: Heinrich Heine
